page.title: 05My Day
page.content: I woke up at 10.30am. It was dullish I got upand had a stroll round the house in my pyjamas. Then at about 11.30am I bunged on my clothes. Then I went through for my dinner. Then after that Angela came round for me at 1.30. So we sat around at the play park. Then Angela told me that we sat around waiting for her. Then Fraser told us that Donna was at the top of the square. So we went up to see her at 2.30. So we went down to the Bogie Bridge to have a look. Then Donna wanted the toilet so we went up to the publics, we waited outside. When she came out we went to Angela's house for a drink of cola, then before we new it it was 5.00pm so we all went home for our supper. I had broth, beef & potatoes and custard. Then Hazel and John cme in for a while. I went to bed at 12.30am.
